feed.title: The Data Conundrum
feed.subtitle: Data is the backbone of every modern system. It can handicap or empower basis how you approach it. One wrong turn, can lead to a catastrophic end and a well-thought approach/strategy can make you a stalwart in your domain. This blog is bringing together the different pieces of this data puzzle to reap meaningful insights and decisions.
